Perceptor:

"Yess, he's the old Megatron... I'm in home" thought Perceptor =
and answered to Decepticon's Leader "After you left Cybertron in your first=
 travel to Earth, I fought with an old enemie who blinding me  in a conclus=
ive battle afther that I fell in stasis lock, I don't know what's happen ne=
xt. I just know that the name of Blindfear became a sort of legend until Pr=
edacons found me and rebuilt me as Predacon before the Beast Wars started a=
nd they kept my identity and objectives in secret: Avenge the Decepticons. =
Some of the main Predacons in Cybertron are Decepticons rebuilted as predac=
ons... Altought my current body is Predacon, my spark is Decepticon"
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: gestalt_menasor@... 
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 9:40 PM
  Subject: Blindfear
=


  Megatron tightened his grip around Perceptor's throat, and 
  sneered. =
"Yes, Megatron, the greatest Decepticon. If you know that, 
  then you know=
 not to toy with me, Blindfear, now I recognize you. 
  Where did you disap=
ear to after all those years." Megatron finished, 
  then gritted his teeth=
, "and, more importantly, do you claim to be a 
  Predacon?"


        Yaho=
o! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject =
to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
